home.title: Professional Sewing Production
home.subtitle: Quality clothing and textile products made to order
home.aboutText:
We are a professional outerwear production with many years of experience.

We specialize in sewing quality women's and men's clothing, as well as textile products for various fields.

We fulfill wholesale orders, private label and individual projects for brands and stores.
home.qualityText1:
Our production is equipped with modern equipment, and experienced craftsmen work on each project.

We guarantee high quality execution, pattern accuracy and adherence to deadlines.
home.qualityText2:
Each product undergoes step-by-step quality control — from cutting to finished product.

This ensures stable, impeccable results for our clients.
home.service1Description: Every season we develop new collections of women's outerwear that meet global trends and comfort requirements.
home.service2Description: We create custom collections — from concept development, patterns and size grading to finished products with your logo and packaging.
home.service3Description: We provide industrial fabric cutting services on automated Gerber system — with maximum precision, speed and material savings.
home.service4Description: We perform artistic and technological quilting on modern equipment. We develop individual patterns and textures.
home.service5Description: We create embroidery that emphasizes your brand's individuality: logos, names, brand details and even designer elements.
home.service6Description: We use leftover materials after sewing main collections to create stylish and practical accessories — bags, cosmetic cases and protective cases.

cta.subtitle: Contact us to discuss your project and get a personalized offer

history.title: Our History
history.subtitle: The development path of our production
history.introText:
The history of our enterprise began in 1988. It all started with a small shoe workshop.

In 1992, the ADONIS brand officially appeared.

Since then, production has developed, technologies have improved, volumes have increased, and we were first presented on the international market. That is why the brand symbol remains unchanged — boots with the Adonis flower, which still reminds us of the company's footwear origins today.

Since 2002, the enterprise began a new chapter in its history — the production of women's outerwear.

Our main principles remain unchanged: experience, quality, professionalism.

We know how important it is for every woman — regardless of size — to feel confident and beautiful. That is why our collections cover a wide size range — from 42 to 80.

Our main qualification now is the production of women's outerwear. At the same time, we have experience in developing men's collections and children's models, which allows us to flexibly implement various partner requests.

For rational use of resources and minimization of production waste, we give fabrics a second life. We use leftover materials after sewing main Adonis collections to create stylish and practical accessories — bags, cosmetic cases and protective cases for beauty master tools. This approach allows us not only to care for the environment, but also to create useful products with unique design.

We work with love for details: from cutting to finishing, from fabric selection to hardware. Our jackets, coats and vests are the result of experience, craftsmanship and modern technologies, including our own embroidery and quilting services.

Adonis is more than just production. It's a team that understands that every product is a story that combines style, quality and care.
history.cooperationText: TM Adonis invites wholesale buyers to cooperate and offers them to replenish their assortment with goods that invariably enjoy increased demand from customers!

founded.title: Beginning
founded.description: The history of our enterprise began with a small shoe workshop

expansion.title: Brand Birth
expansion.description: The ADONIS brand officially appeared. Production developed, technologies improved, volumes increased, and we were first presented on the international market

modernization.title: New Chapter
modernization.description: The enterprise began a new chapter in its history — the production of women's outerwear

present.title: Present
present.description: Modern production of women's and men's outerwear with a wide size range 42–78. We work with a full cycle: own embroidery, quilting, pattern development, individual orders and private label.

adonisCollection.title: ADONIS Own Collection
adonisCollection.description: Every season we develop new collections of women's outerwear that meet global trends and comfort requirements. We offer wholesale sales of ADONIS collections for stores, showrooms and online platforms.

brandProduction.title: Production Under Your Brand
brandProduction.description: We create custom collections — from concept development, patterns and size grading to finished products with your logo and packaging. We have extensive experience in outsourcing and provide a complete production cycle, modern equipment, quality control at every stage, confidentiality and strict adherence to deadlines.

gerberCutting.title: Automated Cutting on Gerber Complex
gerberCutting.description: We provide industrial fabric cutting services on automated Gerber system — with maximum precision, speed and material savings. Perfect solution for brands and manufacturers who need quality cutting without waste.

quilting.title: Fabric Quilting
quilting.description: We perform artistic and technological quilting on modern equipment. We develop individual patterns and textures, creating spectacular solutions for outerwear collections, accessories and interior textiles. We work with different types of fabrics and fillers.
features: Different types of fabrics and fillers

embroidery.title: Embroidery on Any Types of Fabrics
embroidery.description: We create embroidery that emphasizes your brand's individuality: logos, names, brand details and even designer or artistic elements. Modern German equipment ensures perfect accuracy. Maximum working field 60×70 cm. We embroider on any types of fabrics with impeccable quality and attention to every detail.

bags.title: Accessories from Fabric Recycling
bags.description: For rational use of resources and minimization of production waste, we give fabrics a second life. We use leftover materials after sewing main Adonis collections to create stylish and practical accessories — bags, cosmetic cases and protective cases for beauty master tools. This approach allows us not only to care for the environment, but also to create useful products with unique design.

request.title: Request
request.description: We discuss the model and order volume.

sample.title: Sample
sample.description: We produce a sample for approval.

delivery.title: Delivery
delivery.description: We send orders within Ukraine or abroad.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Protection of your personal data
privacy.content:
1. GENERAL PROVISIONS

1.1. This Privacy Policy (hereinafter — "Policy") defines the procedure for processing and protection of personal data of users of the ADONIS website (hereinafter — "Site"), which belongs to ADONIS sewing production (hereinafter — "Company").

1.2. By using the Site, you automatically agree to the terms of this Policy.

2. COLLECTION OF PERSONAL DATA

2.1. The Company collects and processes the following personal data:
- First and last name
- Phone number
- Email address
- Messages you send through the contact form

2.2. Personal data is collected solely with your consent and to provide the services you request.

3. USE OF PERSONAL DATA

3.1. The Company uses personal data to:
- Contact you regarding your inquiries and orders
- Provide information about services and products
- Improve service quality
- Send important messages regarding your orders

3.2. The Company does not transfer personal data to third parties without your consent, except in cases provided by the legislation of Ukraine.

4. PROTECTION OF PERSONAL DATA

4.1. The Company takes all necessary measures to protect personal data from unauthorized access, modification, disclosure or destruction.

4.2. Personal data is stored on secure servers with limited access.

5. USER RIGHTS

5.1. You have the right to:
- Receive information about the processing of your personal data
- Request correction of inaccurate data
- Request deletion of your personal data
- Withdraw consent to the processing of personal data

5.2. To exercise your rights, contact the Company at: adonisinfo8@gmail.com

6. COOKIES

6.1. The Site may use cookies to improve site functionality and collect statistics.

6.2. You can configure your browser to refuse cookies, but this may affect the functionality of the Site.

7. CHANGES TO THE PRIVACY POLICY

7.1. The Company reserves the right to make changes to this Policy. All changes are published on this page.

7.2. By continuing to use the Site after changes are made, you agree to the new terms.

8. CONTACTS

8.1. For all questions regarding the processing of personal data, contact:
Email: adonisinfo8@gmail.com
Phone: +38 099 222 55 29
Address: Kharkiv, Ukraine
